name: Storyhaven
description:
You have been chosen as the hero of Storyhaven and break the Curse of Grimwell, a dark wizard determined to steal the crown and bring chaos to the world. Explore the kingdom to collect treasures and find allies to aid you in your quest.

You will print QR markers to transform your home into the kingdom of Storyhaven. The beautiful valley. The mysterious ruins. The dark cave. Complete the many adventures at each location to earn rewards. These rewards will aid you in your quest to overcome your most difficult and final challenge Grimwell.

Need the QR markers? https://bit.ly/2KPfOai
